title: There Are Only 12 of the Jaw Droppingly Gorgeous Officina Battaglin 1984
content:
Officina Battaglin turn heads once more with the limited edition 1984, celebrating the 40th anniversary of the Giro winner's retirement and the beauty of lugged steel frames

Read the full article at There Are Only 12 of the Jaw Droppingly Gorgeous Officina Battaglin 1984 on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
